data.name: Ritum Bitum
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Ritum Bitum
Ritum Bitum is a 2-in-1 concept: it is a rhythm game and keyboard simulator. The speed, color and position of the letters are determined by your music. Enjoy music while learning keyboard techniques.

Your music in OGG format
Place your music at ".../Ritum Bitum/Ritum Bitum/Content".
Click "Refresh" if you added music after starting the game.

Two game modes:
- "keyboard" - press the corresponding key to catch the letter.
- "mouse + keyboard" - collect letters with the mouse, and collect bright letters with the corresponding key pressed.

Customize the keys


Alternative colors

data.short_description: Ritum Bitum is a 2-in-1 concept: it is a rhythm game and keyboard simulator. The speed, color and position of the letters are determined by your music. Enjoy music while learning keyboard techniques.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
